description:
Ever since I switched from Windows to Linux I missed the simple ability to hit the Windows Key + . to invoke a global emoji picker that works regardless of the app you're working in.

There are some minor performance problems but they've been reduced over a steady stream of updates. Day one install on all my systems from now on.
summary: Exactly what I was looking for

description:
It's very handy to have an emoji picker that I can open quickly with a keyboard shortcut, and use with any app.

The custom tags feature is great for me because I use certain emoji for special purposes in my todo lists. I can tag and search by the meaning I have assigned, instead of having to remember the default tags.
summary: I love the custom tags option!

description: No puedo entender cuál es el punto en hacer que la aplicación se cierre por completo cada vez que seleccionás un emoji. Si necesitás seleccionar más de un emoji es un dolor.
